name: Genius Marketo Form Prefill (API-Free)
author: overstack.io

sections.description:
This API-Free plugin automatically prefills any forms embedded on your website with lead data from Marketo.
Supports the new Form Pre-Fill Feature Upgrade and can prefill also non-Marketo forms (requires some additional configuration).

See Demo Video

Main Features
* Plug & Play – Enable the prefilling instantly by installing the plugin on your WordPress account and inserting a link to one of your Marketo landing pages.

  • API-Free – No API integration or coding are required. The plugin leverages native browser capabilities to automatically retrieve lead data from Marketo.

  • Secure – Your visitors’ data is not shared, stored or being processed on any 3rd party platform. GDPR Compliant.

Upgrade Your Genius Marketo Form Prefill

PRO version includes:

  • Unlimited forms & prefills
  • Up to 10 Fields
  • Auto iFrames Tagging
  • Non-Marketo forms prefill
  • 2 Domains

PREMIUM version includes:

  • Unlimited forms & prefills
  • Up to 10 Fields
  • Auto iFrames Tagging
  • Non-Marketo forms prefill
  • Unbounce & Instapage Integration
  • Multi Domains
  • Tech Support

Buy now

Disclaimer

1. This plugin is not an official Marketo product.

2. This plugin is not developed by or affiliated with Marketo in any way.

3. We consider you to be a Marketo customer. If not, you will first need to become their customer. Visit: https://www.marketo.com

4. Please review Marketo’s terms and conditions: https://documents.marketo.com/legal/eusa/us/2012-08-28/

5. This plugin doesn’t use any API in order to prefill your Marketo forms.

6. There is a minor usage of external API which is operated through the api.overstack.io domain. It is used only for plugin authentication and to compare your domain and provided API token against our database. These API requests are also documented in the database for analytics and monitoring purposes. All the time that the API key field is empty – no tracking or API activities are executed.

7. You may review our Privacy Terms at any time: https://overstack.io/privacy.html
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin files to your plugins folder, or install using WordPress’ built-in Add New Plugin installer
  2. Activate the plugin
  3. Go to ‘Marketo Prefill’ from the left menu
  4. Insert a link to one of your Marketo landing page that includes a form. It’s a best practice to have a dedicated page for this purpose without any other elements except the form (for improved performance).
  5. For Pro/Premium users: insert your API key, provided by the overstack.io team
  6. Activate and save the changes
sections.faq:
Does this plugin require Marketo?

Yes

How this can be installed on my website?

Enable the prefilling instantly by installing the plugin on your WordPress account and inserting a link to one of your Marketo landing pages.

Does the connector require API implementation?

No API integration or coding are required. The plugin leverages native browser capabilities to automatically retrieve lead data from Marketo landing pages.

Why it is better to use an API-Free plugin (like this one)?

Well, there are so many reasons. Here are the most important ones:

  • [[Security!!]] granting an API access to your Marketo lead database might cause a serious privacy breaches and it’s problematic for GDPR reasons

  • DoS vulnerability. Meaning that if a bots or crawlers are attacking your website – this might cause issues in your Marketo instance.

  • External API request slow down your website and damage its performance

  • For websites with high volume traffic querying Marketo on every page view will make you reach your daily API limit vary fast

  • Purchasing extra API packages from Marketo is super expensive

There are many more – check out the relevant discussions on the Marketo community

Is it secure?

Yes. Your visitors’ data is not shared, stored or processed on any 3rd party platform. With that, we urge you to run your website on the HTTPS security encryption as well as taking every precaution to protect your visitor’s personal data when they are on your website.

Can I install the connector on multiple WordPress accounts I own?

Yes, you will need to upgrade to the Premium version for that. see details on https://overstack.io/tools/prefill.html
